structure.unit: ARTICLE IX. SECURITY AT MIAMI-DADE WATER AND SEWER DEPARTMENT

text.section:
Sec. 32-170. Legislative intent.
The intent of the County Commission in enacting this Article is to accomplish the following goals and purposes at the Miami-Dade Water and Sewer Department.
Improve security.
Retain certain of the present identification procedures, and adopt certain new procedures providing greater security protection.
Establish rules and regulations governing security at Miami-Dade Water and Sewer Department facilities.
Protect the public health, safety and welfare by preventing crime, detecting, arresting and prosecuting violators of Article IX of Chapter 32 of the Code of Miami-Dade County.
